short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vtabs provide a vertical list on side panel to manage your tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vtabs provide a vertical list on side panel to manage your tabs.
Install the vtabs, and pin vtabs to your extension panel, click vtabs button, then, you will see.
